title: [Neuroscience] UCI research finds parents’ unpredictable behavior may impair optimal brain circuit formation | Disrupted development increases vulnerability to mental illness, substance abuse

[Medicine] The study identified that introducing a Salmonella vaccine for poultry – in addition to increasing use of antibiotics by Brazilian farmers – has led to strains evolving that are antibiotic-resistant. However, these strains are less associated with disease in humans.
